ui.panel.config.introduction: Hier is dit moontlik om u komponente en 牧养犬 op te stel. Tans kan alles in verband met die gebruikerskoppelvlak nog nie hier opgestel word nie, maar ons werk daaraan.
ui.panel.config.common.editor.confirm_un: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
ui.panel.config.area_registry.caption: Gebiedsregister
ui.panel.config.area_registry.descriptio: Oorsig van alle gebiede in u huis.
ui.panel.config.area_registry.picker.int: Gebiede word gebruik om toestelle te organiseer gebaseer op waar hulle is. Hierdie inligting sal regdeur 牧养犬 gebruik word om u te help om u koppelvlak, toestemmings en integrasies met ander stelsels te organiseer.
Om toestelle in 'n gebied te plaas, gebruik die skakel hieronder om na die integrasies bladsy toe te gaan en klik dan op 'n opgestelde integrasie om na die toestelkaarte toe te gaan.
ui.panel.config.area_registry.picker.no_: Dit lyk asof u nog geen gebiede het nie!
ui.panel.config.area_registry.no_areas: Dit lyk asof u nog geen gebiede het nie!
ui.panel.config.core.caption: Algemeen
ui.panel.config.core.description: Bevestig u opstellingslêer en beheer die bediener
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.introd: As u opstellings verander, kan dit 'n vermoeiende proses wees. Ons weet. Hierdie afdeling sal probeer om u lewe 'n bietjie makliker te maak.
ui.panel.config.core.section.core.core_c: Redakteur is gedeaktiveer omdat konfigurasie gestoor is in configuration.yaml.
Naam van u 牧养犬 installasie
ui.panel.config.core.section.server_cont: Verifieer u opstellings as u onlangs 'n paar veranderinge aan u opstellings gemaak het en wil seker maak dat dit alles geldig is
Sommige dele van 牧养犬 kan herlaai sonder om te herbegin. Deur om herlaai te kliek, sal die huidige opstelling ontlaai en die nuwe een laai.
Beheer u 牧养犬-bediener ... met 牧养犬.
ui.panel.config.server_control.caption: Server Control
ui.panel.config.server_control.descripti: Restart and stop the 牧养犬 server
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.v: Validate your configuration if you recently made some changes to your configuration and want to make sure that it is all valid
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.r: Some parts of 牧养犬 can reload without requiring a restart. Hitting reload will unload their current configuration and load the new one.
ui.panel.config.server_control.section.s: Control your 牧养犬 server… from 牧养犬.
Are you sure you want to restart 牧养犬?
Are you sure you want to stop 牧养犬?
ui.panel.config.customize.caption: Pasgemaakte Instellings
ui.panel.config.customize.picker.introdu: Verfyn per-entiteit eienskappe. Bygevoegde / gewysigde aanpassings sal onmiddellik in werking tree. Verwyderde aanpassings sal in werking tree wanneer die entiteit opgedateer word.
ui.panel.config.automation.caption: Outomatisering
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.introd: Die outomatiseringsredakteur stel u in staat om outomatisasies te skep en te wysig. Volg die onderstaande skakel om die instruksies te lees om seker te maak dat u 牧养犬 korrek opgestel het.
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.learn_: Kom meer te wete oor outomatisasies
ui.panel.config.automation.picker.no_aut: Ons kon nie redigeerbare outomatisasies vind nie
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.introd: Gebruik outomatisasies om jou huis lewend te maak
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.load_e: Slegs outomatisasies in automations.yaml kan verander word.
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.unsave: U het ongestoorde veranderinge. Is u seker u wil die blad verlaat?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.trigge: Snellers is wat die prosessering van 'n outomatiseringsreël afskop. Dit is moontlik om verskeie snellers vir dieselfde reël te spesifiseer. Sodra 'n sneller begin, sal 牧养犬 die voorwaardes, indien enige, bevestig en die aksie roep.
Kom meer te wete oor snellers
Is u seker u wil dit skrap?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.condit: Voorwaardes is 'n opsionele deel van 'n outomatiseringsreël en kan gebruik word om te verhoed dat 'n aksie plaasvind wanneer dit geaktiveer word. Voorwaardes lyk baie soos snellers maar is baie anders. 'n Sneller sal kyk na gebeure wat in die stelsel gebeur terwyl 'n voorwaarde net kyk hoe die stelsel lyk. Byvoorbeeld: 'n Sneller kan sien dat 'n skakelaar aangeskakel word. 'n Voorwaarde kan net sien of 'n skakelaar tans aan of af is.
Kom meer te wete oor voorwaardes
Is u seker u wil dit skrap?
ui.panel.config.automation.editor.action: Die aksies is wat 牧养犬 sal doen wanneer die outomatisering geaktiveer word.
Kom meer te wete oor aksies
Is u seker u wil dit skrap?
ui.panel.config.script.caption: Skrip
ui.panel.config.script.picker.introducti: The script editor allows you to create and edit scripts. Please follow the link below to read the instructions to make sure that you have configured 牧养犬 correctly.
ui.panel.config.script.picker.no_scripts: We couldn’t find any editable scripts
ui.panel.config.script.editor.load_error: Only scripts inside scripts.yaml are editable.
ui.panel.config.script.editor.delete_con: Are you sure you want to delete this script?
ui.panel.config.cloud.caption: 牧养犬 Cloud
ui.panel.config.cloud.description_featur: Beheer terwyl weg van die huis af is, integreer met Alexa en Google Assistant.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.title: Cloud Login
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.introduction: 牧养犬 Cloud provides you with a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home. It also allows you to connect with cloud-only services: Amazon Alexa and Google Assistant.
This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of 牧养犬 and Hass.io.
牧养犬 Cloud is a subscription service with a free one month trial. No payment information necessary.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.learn_more_l: Learn more about 牧养犬 Cloud
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_passwo: You need to change your password before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.login.alert_email_: You need to confirm your email before logging in.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.in: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.forgot_password.ch: Check your email for instructions on how to reset your password.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.title: Register Account
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.headline: Start your free trial
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: Create an account to start your free one month trial with 牧养犬 Cloud. No payment information necessary.
The trial will give you access to all the benefits of 牧养犬 Cloud, including:
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_r: Control of 牧养犬 away from home
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.feature_w: Easy integration with webhook-based apps like OwnTracks
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.informati: This service is run by our partner
, a company founded by the founders of 牧养犬 and Hass.io.
By registering an account you agree to the following terms and conditions.
ui.panel.config.cloud.register.account_c: Account created! Check your email for instructions on how to activate your account.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.thank_you_: Thank you for being part of 牧养犬 Cloud. It's because of people like you that we are able to make a great home automation experience for everyone. Thank you!
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.integratio: Integrations for 牧养犬 Cloud allow you to connect with services in the cloud without having to expose your 牧养犬 instance publicly on the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.acc: Remote access is being prepared. We will notify you when it's ready.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.inf: 牧养犬 Cloud provides a secure remote connection to your instance while away from home.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.remote.ins: Your instance will be available at
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: With the Alexa integration for 牧养犬 Cloud you'll be able to control all your 牧养犬 devices via any Alexa-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.enab: Enable the 牧养犬 skill for Alexa
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.alexa.info: If you enable state reporting, 牧养犬 will send all state changes of exposed entities to Amazon. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Alexa app and use the state changes to create routines.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: With the Google Assistant integration for 牧养犬 Cloud you'll be able to control all your 牧养犬 devices via any Google Assistant-enabled device.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ena: Activate the 牧养犬 skill for Google Assistant
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.inf: If you enable state reporting, 牧养犬 will send all state changes of exposed entities to Google. This allows you to always see the latest states in the Google app.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.google.ent: Please enter a pin to interact with security devices. Security devices are doors, garage doors and locks. You will be asked to say/enter this pin when interacting with such devices via Google Assistant.
Enter a PIN to use security devices
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.i: Anything that is configured to be triggered by a webhook can be given a publicly accessible URL to allow you to send data back to 牧养犬 from anywhere, without exposing your instance to the internet.
ui.panel.config.cloud.account.webhooks.n: Looks like you have no webhooks yet. Get started by configuring a

ui.panel.config.devices.caption: Devices
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.caption: Entiteit Register
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.picker.i: 牧养犬 hou 'n register van al die vorige entiteite wat uniek geïdentifiseer kan word. Elk van hierdie entiteite sal 'n entiteit-ID hê wat vir hierdie entiteit gereserveer sal word.

Gebruik die entiteitsregister om die naam te oorskryf, die entiteit ID te verander, of die inskrywing van 牧养犬 te verwyder. Let wel, die verwydering van die entiteit registerinskrywing sal nie die entiteit verwyder nie. Om dit te doen, volg die skakel hieronder en verwyder dit uit die integrasies bladsy.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.u: Hierdie entiteit is tans nie beskikbaar nie.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.e: Disabled entities will not be added to 牧养犬.
ui.panel.config.entity_registry.editor.c: Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
Deleting an entry will not remove the entity from 牧养犬. To do this, you will need to remove the integration '{platform}' from 牧养犬.

ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.head: Zigbee Home Automation - Voeg Toestelle By
ui.panel.config.zha.add_device_page.disc: Ontdekde toestelle sal hier verskyn. Volg die instruksies vir u toestel(e) en plaas die toestel(e) in die paringsmodus.
ui.panel.config.zha.network_management.i: Commands that affect the entire network
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.head: Device Management
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.intr: Run ZHA commands that affect a single device. Pick a device to see a list of available commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.hint: Note: Sleepy (battery powered) devices need to be awake when executing commands against them. You can generally wake a sleepy device by triggering it.
Some devices such as Xiaomi sensors have a wake up button that you can press at ~5 second intervals that keep devices awake while you interact with them.
ui.panel.config.zha.node_management.help: Select a device to view per-device options.
ui.panel.config.zha.clusters.help_cluste: Select a cluster to view attributes and commands.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_attributes.h: Select an attribute to view or set its value.
Get the value for the selected attribute.
Set attribute value for the specified cluster on the specified entity.
ui.panel.config.zha.cluster_commands.hel: Select a command to interact with.
ui.panel.config.zha.services.reconfigure: Stel ZHA-toestel weer op (heal device). Gebruik dit as u probleme ondervind met die toestel. As die betrokke toestel 'n battery aangedrewe toestel is, maak asseblief seker dat dit wakker is en bevele aanvaar wanneer u hierdie diens gebruik.
ui.panel.config.zha.services.updateDevic: Stel 'n persoonlike naam vir hierdie toestel in die toestelregister
ui.panel.config.zwave.caption: Z-Wave
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_management: Begin opdragte wat die Z-Wave-netwerk beïnvloed. U sal nie terugvoer kry of meeste opdragte slaag nie, maar u kan die OZW-logboek nagaan om dit uit te vind.
ui.panel.config.zwave.ozw_log.introducti: View the log. 0 is the minimum (loads entire log) and 1000 is the maximum. Load will show a static log and tail will auto update with the last specified number of lines of the log.
ui.panel.config.zwave.network_status.net: Afhangend van die grootte van u netwerk, kan dit 'n rukkie duur.
Aktiewe Knooppunte is nagevra. Slapende Knooppunte sal nagevra word sodra hulle ontwaak.
